description: Teapot with lid, ceramic-porcelain, white ground with sprigs of gold, brown, and blue cornflowers with yellow leaves, French, XVIIIc. (see also Lid 25.417.35.2) NO DIMS ON CAT. CARDS
markings: \'M\'; crowned, in red and a monogram of Louis Stanislas Xavier, patron of the factory. the crowned M stands for \'Monsieur,\' the king\'s brother, Louis Stanislas Xavier. It was not used after 1790 as a mark.
title: Teapot
